definitions.definition: An oral dryness often associated with certain medicines and recreational drugs .
A snake, Agkistrodon piscivorus , the water moccasin .
A snake, Agkistrodon contortrix mokasen , the northern copperhead .

main_definition: ( medicine , uncountable ) An oral dryness often associated with certain medicines and recreational drugs .
secondary_definitions: A snake, Agkistrodon piscivorus , the water moccasin .
A snake, Agkistrodon contortrix mokasen , the northern copperhead .
